title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2282/86 of 22 July 1986 fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 3430/85
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2282/86
of 22 July 1986
fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 3430/85
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The weighting coefficients referred to in Article 4 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2759/75 shall be as specified in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 July 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
